millsfield:images_texts:
Use the World-Wide Plan,
Go Now—Pay Later, to put you
in this homan picture.
You can
be there...
PAA
Overnight
only $56 down
... as many as 17
European cities
The quickest way to get into your summer vacation
in Europe is on the wings of Pan Am's "Super-7"
Clippers* (the ones that set all those trans-
atlantic speed records)!
With a Pan Am round-trip ticket to Rome in
your pocket, you can sample customs and cultures
all over the continent—see 17 cities at no extra
cost. It takes so little money these days, it's a won-
der why anyone stays home. Two-week excursion
to Rome is only $56 down — that's 10% of the fare.
Get set for some of the happiest hours you ever
spent ... when you take Pan Am's tourist-fare
Rainbow service across the Atlantic. For you, we've
reserved the newest, fastest and quietest over-
ocean airliners in the world-
"Super-7" Clippers
(Douglas-built DC-7Cs). Their radar eyes with 150-
mile vision find the fair weather way to Europe.
Reserve your BIG DAY by
"Super-7" right away.
Seems as if almost everyone wants to go and space
is going fast. Call your Travel Agent or Pan Am.
HOLIDAY MAY
WORLD'S MOST
EXPERIENCED
AIRLINE
PAN
AMERICAN
•Trade-Mark, Reg. U. S. Pat. Off.
properties.sfomuseum:description: Advertisement from May 1953 issue of Holiday promoting Pan American World Airways, titled “You can be there ... Overnight only $56 down ... as many as 17 European cities” with color illustration depicting uniformed officer holding map and offering navigational directions to woman wearing Pan Am flight bag.
properties.sfomuseum:subject: Pan Am promotional advertisement
properties.wof:name: advertisement: Pan American World Airways, Holiday
